Elemental Tools
After unlocking Infusion, you can craft a series of powerful Elemental Tools. These tools require minimal Vis and a single piece of Rare Earth, making them highly cost-effective. Here's a breakdown of their features and abilities:

 Pickaxe of the Core

Runes: Infused with Blazing I and Ore Detection II.
Capabilities:
25% chance to yield Ore Clusters when mining raw ores.
Shift + Right-Click consumes 10 durability to highlight nearby ore deposits.
Struck entities are set ablaze.

Blade of Zephyr

Runes: Infused with Arcing II.
Capabilities:
Strikes trigger Chain Lightning, which damages secondary targets.
Right-Click unleashes a whirlwind, pushing back nearby foes and causing the wielder to hover gently.

Axe ofthe Stream

Runes: Infused with Harvesting and Fell Sweep.
Capabilities:
Fells entire trees, starting from the farthest block, and accelerates leaf decay for faster sapling drops.
Automatically attracts felled logs and items toward the wielder.
Right-Click pulls nearby dropped items to the wielder.

Shovel of the Earthmover

Runes: Infused with Earthbreaker.
Capabilities:
Mines 3×3 areas of dirt, sand, or similar blocks.
Right-Click duplicates a 3×3 block pattern if matching blocks are available.
Press G to adjust placement orientation.

Hoe of Growth

Capabilities:
Tills a 3×3 area in one swing.
Right-Click accelerates crop or plant growth.
All Elemental Tools are extremely versatile and an essential addition for any Thaumaturge. Crafting them as soon as resources allow is highly recommended!
